For a moment his imagination so vivid! She could smell Gwendolyn Chastains perfume in the moment before the madwomans hands closed around her throat. She was mounting a set of stone steps in the company of a husky policewoman, her face dull, devoid of expression.
("Virginia") Sandpipers first communication had consisted of a two-page handwritten letter and seven Polaroids. There was craziness in that grin, but he saw something else in it as well, something that really frightened him. Her cardigan sweater was burning, too.   Ill say I asked him in for a cup of coffee even though I was in a hurry to be on my way and theyll ask me why. A small khaki bag, too big to be a purse and not quite big enough to be a knapsack, was slung over one shoulder.
